donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Increase the prompt and effective treatment of malaria cases in children under 5 to exceed 80% and increase Household ownership and use of ITN coverage to 80% in the national population by 2011.

project_descr: Round 4 Malaria Grant Phase 2 NCE - Scaling up of Equitable and Sustainable Interventions for Malaria Prevention and Control in Zambia
project_title: GFATM Round 4 Malaria Grant in Zambia
